actions.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Coburn.
On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 2 - 426, 1 Present (Roll no. 74).

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to replace the text of the resolution with the President's completed budget proposal as scored by CBO.
purpose: An amendment numbered 1 in part 2 of House Report 106-77 and made in order by the rule to substitute the President's completed budget proposal as scored by CBO.
